tasks.title: Kabalebo TLS configuration
tasks.description:
- Installed a spare USIOM board for the TLS system.
- After startup, a tank chart was required for calibration.
- 611 values will be added as multipoint entries within the TLS for accurate tank level mapping.

tasks.title: Kabaelbo NOCRU board pre programming
tasks.description:
- A new Norcu board has been preprogrammed using data from the Prime fleet dispenser for seamless compatibility.
- Once Baitali establishes the internet connection, the Norcu board will be integrated.
- This will restore communication via LAN2, ensuring full network functionality.

tasks.title: Sino 2 Truck FMS -EMR4 testing
tasks.description:
- Pre-configuration of the Sino Truck system has been completed.
- Successfully tested with the EMR pulser; system status confirmed as OK.
- System handed over for further synchronization and final setup steps
